jobDetails.title: Product Owner
jobDetails.description: TS4U Ltd. is looking for energetic and proactive individuals to be a part of our development team, supporting established projects and creating from the ground up. The ideal candidate is an experienced leader and team player who is adept at product management.
responsibilities: Plan and prioritize product feature backlog and development for the product.
Defines, develop, and manages product vision, strategies, and roadmaps.
Assess value, develop cases, and prioritize stories, epics, and features to ensure work focuses on those with maximum value that are aligned with product strategy.
Provide backlog management, iteration planning, and elaboration of the user stories.
Providing vision and direction to the Agile development team and stakeholders throughout the project.
Support the Operation team in onboarding new candidates.
Translate business requirements to the development team to enable the creation of actionable tasks.
Writing user stories from the user's perspective will be an important point to showcase.
Lead the scrum team in using Agile methodology and scrum practices.
Take ownership of product success.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree required or equivalent experience.
Minimum 3 years experience as a product owner in the industry.
Strong knowledge of Agile principles and processes; CSPO is nice to have.
In-depth understanding of industry market conditions and trends.
Outstanding verbal and written communication skills
Successful track record of developing products within deadlines.
Excellent attention to detail.
Sharp analytical and problem-solving skills.
Creative and innovative thinker.

jobDetails.title: Mentor and Software Engineer Assistant for (Java, Python and NodeJs)
jobDetails.description: TS4U Ltd. is looking for experienced software professionals to mentor and assist in course design and interview preparation.
responsibilities: Mentor students in Java, Python, and NodeJs.
Design courses and workshop materials.
Assist in interview preparation and technical problem-solving.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience.
3+ years experience in software development.
Proficiency in Java, Python, and NodeJs.

jobDetails.title: Mid-Level Graphic Designer with Video Design Experience
jobDetails.description: TS4U Ltd. is seeking creative and detail-oriented graphic designers with expertise in video design.
responsibilities: Create graphics and video materials for branding and marketing.
Collaborate with the marketing team.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously.
qualifications: 2-3 years of experience in graphic and video design.
Proficiency in Adobe Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects).

jobDetails.title: Junior Front-End Developer
jobDetails.description: We are looking for a talented junior front-end developer to build responsive web applications.
responsibilities: Develop responsive web applications.
Assist lead engineers in coding and debugging.
Implement state management libraries and design patterns.
qualifications: Proficiency in JavaScript, ReactJs, NextJs, and Redux.
Strong problem-solving skills and knowledge of modern web technologies.

jobDetails.title: Mid-Level SEO Expert
jobDetails.description: TS4U Ltd. is looking for an experienced SEO expert to optimize content and drive web traffic.
responsibilities: Conduct keyword research and website optimization.
Monitor web traffic and SEO performance metrics.
Collaborate with marketing teams to ensure SEO best practices.
qualifications: Proven experience in SEO.
Expertise in tools like Google Analytics, Ahrefs, and SEMrush.
Strong analytical and reporting skills.

jobDetails.title: Lead Generation Intern
jobDetails.description: An exciting internship opportunity for individuals interested in marketing and lead generation.
responsibilities: Collect leads and schedule meetings.
Collaborate with the operations team to guide leads to trial programs.
Understand partner processes and maintain professionalism.
qualifications: Fluent in English writing.
Smart and quick learner.
Willingness to work in a fast-paced environment.

jobDetails.title: Lead Generation Specialist
jobDetails.description: A professional role focusing on lead generation strategies and campaign creation.
responsibilities: Develop and execute lead generation strategies.
Create and manage engaging marketing campaigns.
Collaborate with sales teams and track/report lead generation activities.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.
1-2 years of experience in lead generation.
Strong understanding of digital marketing channels and techniques.

jobDetails.title: MERN Stack Developer
jobDetails.description: We are seeking a skilled MERN stack developer to join our dynamic development team.
responsibilities: Develop full-stack web applications using the MERN stack.
Maintain and create RESTful APIs.
Implement front-end interfaces and debug issues.
qualifications: Proven experience in MERN stack development.
Strong knowledge of JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js.
Experience with version control tools like Git.

jobDetails.title: QA Automation Engineer
jobDetails.description: TS4U Ltd. is looking for a QA Automation Engineer to design and implement automated testing for web and mobile applications.
responsibilities: Design and implement automated test cases.
Collaborate with developers to debug and resolve issues.
Track bugs and perform regression testing.
qualifications: Proven experience with Selenium and other automation tools.
Proficiency in Java, Python, or JavaScript.
Strong understanding of QA methodologies and practices.

jobDetails.title: CloudOps Mentor Assistant
jobDetails.description: Join TS4U as a CloudOps Mentor Assistant, helping to guide and support students in Cloud and DevOps practices.
responsibilities: Assist in mentoring CloudOps/DevOps Bootcamp students.
Design program content and quiz materials.
Troubleshoot system issues and support mentees.
qualifications: Proficiency in DevOps tools like Git, Jenkins, and Kubernetes.
Strong understanding of CI/CD processes.
Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.

jobDetails.title: Business Support Analyst
jobDetails.description: An entry-level role focusing on administrative and business support tasks in a hybrid environment.
responsibilities: Take detailed meeting notes and organize tasks.
Support business operations and learn new applications.
Collaborate with different teams for administrative support.
qualifications: Strong organizational and administrative skills.
Proficiency in Google Drive tools (Docs, Sheets, Slides).
Fluency in English communication.

jobDetails.title: Business & Marketing Specialist
jobDetails.description: Join TS4U as a Business & Marketing Specialist to develop and implement impactful marketing strategies.
responsibilities: Create marketing strategies and promotional campaigns.
Conduct market research and monitor campaign performance.
Coordinate events like trade shows and product launches.
qualifications: Experience in social media and email marketing.
Proficiency in tools like Google Analytics and AdWords.
Strong organizational and creative skills.
